resources.string:
Welcome to resOverloader.
 resOverloader is fully working and helps android rooted users to use any foreign application in local language.
 The application works in Xposed framework. Learn more

 The GUI will allow users to select and translate any application to any locale/language on the fly in near future. 
 If you like my idea and want to support further development, please donate a juice to my kids. Thank you. 
 Email: ilyas.com.pk@gmail.com
